instruction:
Create a daily itinerary based on the given information.

Our family is looking for a 9-day Morocco trip that has light to moderate activity levels.
output:
Day 1: Arrival in Marrakech
- Arrive at Marrakech Menara Airport
- Transfer to your riad in the medina
- Rest and relax after your journey
- Explore the Jardin Majorelle and the Yves Saint Laurent Museum
- Dinner at a local restaurant

Day 2: Marrakech
- Breakfast at your riad
- Visit the Bahia Palace and the Saadian Tombs
- Explore the souks and markets of the medina
- Lunch at a local restaurant
- Visit the Koutoubia Mosque and the Museum of Marrakech
- Dinner at a local restaurant

Day 3: Marrakech to Essaouira
- Breakfast at your riad
- Transfer to Essaouira (approximately 3 hours)
- Check-in to your riad
- Explore the medina and the beach
- Lunch at a local restaurant
- Visit the Skala de la Kasbah and the Sidi Mohammed ben Abdallah Museum
- Dinner at a local restaurant

Day 4: Essaouira
- Breakfast at your riad
- Take a day trip to the nearby village of Ounagha
- Lunch at a local restaurant
- Return to Essaouira and explore the beach
- Dinner at a local restaurant

Day 5: Essaouira to Fes
- Breakfast at your riad
- Transfer to Fes (approximately 6 hours)
- Check-in to your riad
- Explore the medina and the souks
- Lunch at a local restaurant
- Visit the Bou Inania Madrasa and the Al Attarine Madrasa
- Dinner at a local restaurant

Day 6: Fes
- Breakfast at your riad
- Visit the Royal Palace and the Merenid Tombs
- Explore the souks and markets of the medina
- Lunch at a local restaurant
- Visit the Dar Batha Museum and the Fes el-Jdid
- Dinner at a local restaurant

Day 7: Fes to Merzouga
- Breakfast at your riad
- Transfer to Merzouga (approximately 5 hours)
- Check-in to your riad
- Take a camel ride to the Erg Chebbi dunes
- Lunch at a local restaurant
- Return to your riad and relax
- Dinner at a local restaurant

Day 8: Merzouga to Ouarzazate
- Breakfast at your riad
- Transfer to Ouarzazate (approximately 4 hours)
- Check-in to your riad
- Explore the medina and the souks
- Lunch at a local restaurant
- Visit the Taourirt Kasbah and the Atlas Movie Studio
- Dinner at a local restaurant

Day 9: Ouarzazate to Marrakech
- Breakfast at your riad
- Transfer to Marrakech (approximately 4 hours)
- Check-in to your riad
- Rest and relax after your journey
- Farewell dinner at a local restaurant

This itinerary provides a balance of cultural and outdoor activities, with light to moderate physical exertion. You will have the opportunity to explore the vibrant cities of Marrakech and Fes, as well as the coastal town of Essaouira and the desert landscapes of Merzouga and Ouarzazate.
